#BlackMagicCraft #Episode113

GET YOUR OWN BLACK MAGIC CRAFT SHIRTS!
Design 1.0 - http://bit.ly/BMC_Shirt
Design 2.0 - http://bit.ly/BMC_Shirt_2

In this episode I build an evil Blood Fountain for Dungeons & Dragons. This project combines several techniques from recent episodes and uses the same challenge material I gave to the community for the October Tabletop Crafters Guild Craft Off contest. 

BUY MATERIALS FOR THIS BUILD
(As an Amazon Associate I earn from qualifying purchases)
